text: STATEMENT OF SENATOR JOHN MCCAIN
label: BODY

text: FULL COMMITTEE HEARING ON PENDING NOMINATIONS
label: BODY

text: SEPTEMBER 28, 1999
label: BODY

text: As Chairman of the Committee, I would like to thank Senator Hutchison for chairing
label: BODY

text: today=s hearing on several pending nominations.  I also want to take this opportunity to express
label: BODY

text: my strong support for the reconfirmation of Linda Morgan to serve as a member, and Chairman,
label: BODY

text: of the Surface Transportation Board (STB).
label: BODY

text: Ms. Morgan=s extensive professional experience and impressive qualifications have been
label: BODY

text: invaluable to the Board.  Throughout her tenure, she has consistently worked to enforce the
label: BODY

text: transportation policies and public interest standards as established by law.  Ms. Morgan further
label: BODY

text: deserves our commendation for the leadership she demonstrated in managing the closure of the
label: BODY

text: Interstate Commerce Commission (ICC) and the establishment of the STB.  That was no small
label: BODY

text: feat.  We owe thanks to both Chairman Morgan and her very dedicated and capable staff.
label: BODY

text: Since its creation, the STB has made tremendous strides.  It has dealt with some of the
label: BODY

text: most challenging rail transportation matters that have arisen in many years, including the very
label: BODY

text: difficult service crisis in the West.  It has also managed to reduce the backlog of pending cases
label: BODY

text: which it inherited from the former ICC.  I can think of no other federal entity that has carried out
label: BODY

text: such a vast work load with such a limited level of resources.
label: BODY

text: Many critical transportation decisions and responsibilities remain before the STB and
label: BODY

text: these challenges are not expected to diminish.  The achievements already attained by the Board
label: BODY

text: are greatly attributed to Chairman Morgan=s tireless dedication and commitment.  Therefore, in
label: BODY

text: my judgement, Linda Morgan=s reconfirmation as Chairman of the STB should be a top priority.
label: BODY

text: The American citizens would be well served by Ms. Morgan=s reappointment.  We need more
label: BODY

text: forward-thinking and committed individuals like Linda to serve in the federal government.
label: BODY

text: It is my intent for the Committee to act swiftly on her confirmation.
label: BODY
